segments.text: My attention is drawn to the children on the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the "COOKIE JAR," completely focused on his mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister stands below, hand outstretched, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how close that stool is to tipping over backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could go at any second, and he's so high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's anticipation is almost palpable; she just wants a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm actually quite impressed by their daring plan to get treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely breaking a rule by taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is an accident waiting to happen, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is oblivious to this secret operation happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a bold move for such small children to attempt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be working together quite effectively.
segments.speaker: PAR
